title: I just did a big mistake
body: I just realoded my pulsefire ezreal in hextech and i wont to do this. What shuold i go?{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Unfortunately, once a shard has been re-rolled there's no way to get it back.  It's really important to be mindful of the content that's being re-rolled before confirming the craft.  It really sucks that happened, and I hope with some luck you can find another!
